entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Weyburn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Weyburn 01:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
